snippet.title: All in Abyss: Judge the Fake - Official INDIE Live Expo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
All in Abyss: Judge the Fake is a poker battle mystery adventure RPG developed by WSS Playground. Players will gamble against grifters wielding witchcraft to tilt the odds and unleash a cadre of card skills to even the playing field. Gain the upper hand by exploring the gambling district in searching for clues to expose the truth behind the witches’ supernatural card tricks. All in Abyss: Judge the Fake is launching in 2024 for PC (Steam).

#AllInAbyssJudgeTheFake #IGN #Gameplay
